description_en: Future Labs Europe, part of the Futurelabs Enterprise group, recently acquired Britec Srl, consolidating over 15 years of specialized experience in the display, cable, and integrated solutions sector. This strategic move has significantly expanded the product portfolio, making it broader and more competitive, while strengthening technical and logistical support for customers, distributors, and partners on a national and European scale. The company positions itself as a reliable partner for diversified markets, offering customized solutions that combine flexibility and high-quality standards. The international team follows projects from the initial phases, transforming ideas into concrete, valuable products with a focus on innovation and continuous support.
